name: Jimmy

topics.response_text: {Player in combat}Hey, don't drag me into this!
Half a year or so. The Casa's a dump and Marco's a pig, but Pretty Sarah makes sure I don't get hassled.

topics.topic_text: I hear you were a slave of Caesar's Legion.
topics.response_text: What Marco said is true. The Legion attacked my village when I was 16.

topics.topic_text: Sounds like life in the Legion is tough.
topics.response_text: It's tough on both sides of the fence, really. I think women have it worse. They're like money, given as rewards.{Shakes head}Breeding stock.
Yeah, I lived through it. I like it here better.
She's an honest woman. Splits the earnings fair, and keeps Sweetie and Maude in line.
{Male PC}A pittance, sugar - and I'll leave you without a care in the world.
Oh, we will, sugar. We will.
{Male PC}You can play hard-to-get. I understand. I know the game.

topics.topic_text: <200 caps needed> I'm kind of short on caps right now.
topics.response_text: No freebies, Sugar. Not even for you.

topics.topic_text: {Confirmed Bachelor}Back rubs are a specialty of mine. Maybe I'll show you sometime.
topics.response_text: Oh, I think I'd like that. A lot. Maybe even give you a discount for my... company.

description:
Jimmy is a 22 year-old African American Male.

A young African American man living in Westside, working as a prostitute at the Casa Madrid Apartments. Jimmy is openly gay and provides insight into the experiences of LGBT individuals in the harsh wasteland environment.

Jimmy's Personality: Resilient and adaptable, Jimmy maintains a cynical outlook but values his independence and the protection Pretty Sarah provides. Despite his circumstances, he's observant and knowledgeable about the dynamics of power and relationships in the wasteland.

Jimmy's Backstory: Jimmy grew up in a small village east of the Colorado River with his parents. When he was 16, Caesar's Legion attacked his village, killing his parents as an example and enslaving Jimmy. He was assigned as a tent servant to a high-ranking centurion, who developed a secret affection for Jimmy. The centurion protected him and provided small gifts, maintaining their relationship in secret as homosexuality is punishable by death under Legion law. When rumors began to spread, the centurion chose his position over his feelings and led Jimmy into the desert to kill him. Realizing his fate, Jimmy fought back, kicked the centurion in the genitals, and fled across the Colorado River. After surviving the desert crossing, he arrived in Westside and began working as a prostitute for Pretty Sarah at the Casa.
